entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Unsafe Study #94941
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] Jiterpreter crash using `System.Text.JSON` and `WasmNativeStrip` usage. #94939
  • Async methods become slower to compile in applications which have a very large number of assemblies #94936
    9.0.0
  • DisabledRuntimeMarshalling.PInvokeAssemblyMarshallingEnabled.DelegatesFromExternalAssembly.StructWithDefaultNonBlittableFields() failing #94931
    9.0.0
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmNativeDefaultsTests.DefaultsWithPublish failing #94926
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression with System.Numerics.Vector when retargeting from .NET 7 to .NET 8 #94920
  • OptionsValidatorGenerator does not generate a Validate method #94912
  • OptionsValidatorGenerator does not reset the ValidationContext before calling IValidatableObject.Validate #94910
  • Segmentation fault when running in emulated amd64 container on M1 Mac #94909
  • Async reading a file in WASM when clicking a button is blocking #94906
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.CreateProcessInfo Platform not supported error in net8.0-ios #94903
  • build clr subset failed on .net RC2 that failed generate native component #94902
  • System.IO.Packaging.Open throws FileFormatException saying File contains corrupted data when the size of the package is more than 4GB and targeting .NET Framework #94899
  • [mono][ppc64le] aspnetcore tests are failing with error "System.InvalidCastException : Specified cast is not valid." on ppc64le #94898
  • [.NET8 + ARM64] Build no longer responds to SIGTERM and gets the Ubuntu service manager in trouble #94897
  • [wasm] Wasm C ABI correctness for "singleton" structs in the mono AOT compiler and interpreter #94895
  • System.AppContext.GetData is not optimized for reads #94894
  • [8.0][wasm] Failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.RunForEachSpecialValue #94891
    8.0.x

Closed

  • Question: How does JSON source gen interact with `JsonConverter<T>`? #94937
  • Test failure Interop/DisabledRuntimeMarshalling/DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_Disabled_NativeAssemblyEnabled/DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_Disabled_NativeAssemblyEnabled.cmd #94900
  • [Mono] System.Runtime.Tests fail with TypeLoadException #94086
    9.0.0
  • AV in R2R SingleFile ASP.NET Core 9.0 app #94929
  • Configuration binder generator creates namespace ambiguity error #94836
    8.0.x
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'Compiling JScript/CSharp scripts is not supported' #94925
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer: boxing when serialize structs #94908
  • Incorrect SYSLIB1102 error #94826
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact throws exception with message missing original string #94907
    9.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance Throwing InvalidOperationException in .NET 8 #94736
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistent Double to UInt64 conversion on ARM vs x64 Architectures #94922
  • SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with username format user@domain.com #94303
    9.0.0
  • Regex engine treats non-capture groups as Captures #94905
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Abstractions 8.0.0 miss net7.0 TFM #94812
    Future
  • Support TimeSpan type in the RangeAttribute emitted code by options validation source generator #94119
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #94938
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: avoid local jtrue assertions involving floating types #94935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #94934
    area-System.Security
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update windows queue to vs2022preview #94924
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Fix incorrect stack type information #94923
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Runtime Identifiers to .NET 6.0 #94913
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Fix mono_lzcnt32/mono_lzcnt64 on windows. #94901
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Added DOTNET_JitRawHexCode/JitRawHexCodeFile #94896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type.GetMethod(name, genericParameterCount, bindingAttr, types) overload #94889
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [ILLink analyzer] Improve handling of invalid operations #94888
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update official windows queue to vs preview to match public #94887
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Disallow arrays of System.Void #94835
    breaking-change, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fix a typo in the ETW manifest #93085
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable dprintf logging for the whole GC #94816
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix cross-block local assertion prop bug; add range enable #94885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version" #94878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update windows queue to vs2022preview #94921
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix invalid C# version diagnostic message in config source generator #94893
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Update windows queue to vs2022preview #94886
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix link to xliff-tasks in localization-options.md #94911
    area-Meta
  • SslStream test keylogfile creation #94859
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add ;$(NetCoreAppPrevious) to src/Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.… #94867
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94748
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94865
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support TimeSpan with RangeAttribute in Options validation source generator #94857
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.x

Updated

  • P/Invokes should use C types not C++. #94942
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fixed setting ReadMode to Message for NamedPipeClientStream on Windows #94742
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add ConstructorBuilder implementation, integrate TypeBuilder.GetXyz() static methods #94732
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • try regMask to unsigned __int128 for linux/arm64 #94589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • UnzipEven() and Count16BitElements() intrinsics for Arm64 SVE #94765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [Async-2] Fix resumption stub target in the presence of backpatching #2428
  • [Async-2]: Tasklet aging #2425
  • Try to see if this will make the CI somewhat ok with our roslyn build… #2423

Merged

  • [Async-2] Switch to JIT prototype by default; add support matrix #2427
  • [Async-2] Null out TLS head continuation reference #2429
  • [Async-2] Fix paths in buildroslynnugets.cmd #2426
  • Add async experiment #2424

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nov 23 #2419

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet tool install` on non-tool package causes DirectoryNotFoundException #37010
  • Self-Contained publish still need user to download .NET runtime after upgrading from .NET 7 to 8 #37005
  • Object reference not set error when trying to use "dotnet new bepinex5plugin" with .NET 8, works with .NET 7 #36991
  • dotnet 8 SDK uninstalls dotnet 7 #36990
  • The .NET 8.0 SDK can't run built binary with `./Test`, but works with `dotnet ./Test.dll` #36985

Closed

  • IIS Express project fails to build with error "Reference to type 'IPEndPoint' claims it is defined in 'System.Net.Primitives', but it could not be found" #36967
  • React template for 8.0 seems to be missing #36969
  • NETSDK1204 error during dotnet clean on macOS when AoT enabled #36960
  • [Bug]: Product version info is shown with error in the exe properties Details for .NET 8.0 #36975

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't overwrite user-provided ContainerUser values #36974
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.1
  • Fix comment on MicrosoftDotNetXliffTasksVersion #36992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2317938 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Target NetStandard2.1 in BrowserRefresh #36981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add indexer to record #7704

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error performing rename: Unexpected value 'FunctionPointerType' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.SyntaxKind' #70881
  • Collection expressions: align `ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind()` with conversions specification #70880
  • Move us to official System.IO.Hashing package once we can. #70878

Closed

  • [Bug]: Cannot go to definition of source-generated type #70832
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34317.88 #70885
  • Use primary constructor (IDE0290) ignores side effects #70868
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34316.174 #70876
  • IDE0251: Triggering On Readonly Property's Init Accessor #70864
  • The SyntaxWalker API doesn't handle deeply nested syntax nodes well. #70834

PullRequests

Created

  • Pool intermediary collections when performing classification tagging/aggregation. #70884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cut off deeply nested collection expressions #70882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Improve formatting when converting to a collection expression #70883
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix use-primary-constructor in the presence of side-effects on the parameters. #70871
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • NRT enable storage layer #70877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'make struct member readonly' with init accessors. #70869
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run .NET Core MSBuildWorkspace tests on machines with VS installed #70849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of SyntaxWalker and mark it as banned in roslyn #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - CSS Isolation problem - missing scope on selectors #52168
  • Add Account/AccessDenied endpoint to blazor web template #52167
  • Use IOutputCacheBufferStore.TryGetAsync #52165
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #52164
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52163
  • LazyLoad assemblies functionality broken in Blazor app when migrating from 7.0.13 to 8.0.0 #52162
  • ResponseCookies.Delete(key, cookieOptions) doesn't delete cookie if the caller provides a non-null max-age #52159
  • Attempts to map multiple blazor entry points with MapBlazorHub causes Ambiguous Route Error. This worked with net7. #52156
  • Blazor Web app with RenderMode.InteractiveWebAssembly requires services to be registered in App in addition to App.Client #52155
  • [Blazor] Auto Render not working properly in .NET 8 and page locks until WebAssembly start #52154
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder with non-default ApplicationName doesn't load user secrets #52152
  • InvalidOperationException: The authentication handler registered for scheme 'bearer' is 'JwtBearerHandler' which cannot be used for SignInAsync #52151
  • Multiple form inputs with the same name render incorrect output. #52150
  • Publish using Web Deploy has locking issues since .NET 8 #52149
  • Blazor Web App does not (always) recompile WebAssembly project when changes were made to RCL project #52148
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52147
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52146
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #52145

Closed

  • Support for Microsoft Identity Platform #52118
  • Template for Minimal API outside of startup #52158
  • Blazor form should not be enhanced when target attribute is different than the default #52020
    Planning: WebUI
  • Uncaught error when submitting enhanced form with method="dialog" #52017
    Planning: WebUI
  • Weird behavior for Global Auto Blazor Web Routing, inconsistent not found behavior, need docs or explanation #52160
  • Perf regression: json, json #52065
  • Perf regression: json #52144
  • Create Blazor server-side rendering guidance for Blazor component library owners #47624
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Blazor: Error: No element is currently associated with component 43 #51825
  • error ASP0023: Route '[action]' conflicts with another action route #52110
  • RouteHandlerAnalyzer throwing exception. #52114
  • Perf improvement: json #52135
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #52136
  • Blazor Standalone WebAssembly project in VS Code doesn't honor applicationUrl in launchSettings.json #25739
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add option to disable logging in sample Blazor app #27721
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add a UI indication for render tree issues #27521
    Planning: WebUI
  • JWT Authentication Error: Bearer error="invalid_token" #52137
  • Set up benchmarks for RequestDelegateGenerator and build times #46414
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Blazor] do not enhance form when method = "dialog" or target != "_self" #52133
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #52035
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0] Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #52034
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • Fallback to ArrayPool in Kestrel #52106
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add Meter Tags, Instrument Tags, and Scopes to System Diagnostics Metrics #4324
  • Provide better error messages for IPC connect failures #4406
  • Make DiagnosticsClient.StartEventPipeSessionAsync public #4394

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ImageButton Padding & Ripple effect stops working with .NET 8 #18857
  • Error on right click on Entry control in different Windows #18853
  • [.NET 8.0, Border] Border inside a RefreshView ruins the width of other controls on iOS #18852
  • ListView pull-to-refresh not working in Windows (WinUI) but work on Android/iOS #18850
  • Platform View Null on a Custom Control #18847
  • 8.0.3 Android FlyoutPage Doesnt work on .NET 7 no problem #18846
  • Maui application does not restart properly after android activity is destroyed #18845
  • NET 8 Breaks iOS CSS again #18844
  • Wrong left margin in the navigation bar on Android #18843
  • WebView Renderer Migration does not load HTML or URL content on Maui compatibility renderer #18842
    Backlog
  • Unable to build with AOT enabled #18839
  • MAUI very slow on physical android devices #18838
  • Using Samsung.Tizen.Sdk/7.0.129 with .NET 7 projects fails to build #18837
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS: Command line to build maui ios app for iPhoneSimulator without CodeSigning key on Mac machine #18836
  • Crash on scrolling collection view #18834
  • Can't create new projects - value cannot be null. (Parameter 'installation') #18833
  • [8.0.3][iOS] Button CharacterSpacing make FontSize fixed and large #18832
  • [8.0.3][Android] Border Shadow in ListView not showing #18831
    Backlog
  • Flyout title doesn't switch on Detail change #18830
  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault breaks hot reload #18829
    Backlog
  • NRE in GridViewLayout.HandlePropertyChanged #18828
  • XA1018 on visual studio 2022 0 release 17.8.0 #18827
  • Initially hidden StackLayout doesn't render if bound IsVisible changes #18820
  • .NET MAUI 8 Android - Cannot create instance of type, no Java peer type found #18819
  • [WinUI3] Cannot publish Windows MSIX when referencing class libraries and using Unit Test project workaround; #18818
  • SecureStorage.GetAsync() hangs in Android devices with .NET 8 GA in VS 2022 17.8.0 - Demo REPO #18817
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry is not triggering the UnFocused event in Android and IOS after upgrading to .NET 8 #18854
  • Workload installation failed #18849
  • [Android]Entry is not unfocus when click in the button #15681
  • [regression/8.0.0] TapGestureRecognizers and Commands not working in MAUI Controls #18848
  • Add NuGet publishing step/gate for Manifest packages #18687
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Secure Storage GetAsync fails to return on Android #18835
  • [regression/8.0.0] [WinUI] Mouse wheel is not working #18250
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
  • Remove width on example items so we can actually see them #18855
  • Create a "Similar Issues" bot #18851
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `TableView` #18718
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.9 to 7.4.0 #18826
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update readme with latest blog post #18763
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.113 to 7.0.114 #18789
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [windows] fix memory leak in `WebView` #18810
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • Update to stable versions of .NET 8 #18732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add CollectionView UITests #18798
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C2 #18794
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changing a string property to `oldValue.ToUpperInvariant()` on SQL Server does not result in an update with .NET 8 #32336
  • What does MaxLengthAttribute (or HasMaxLength) do in Primitive Collections? #32335
  • Combine length/precision/scale from both operands in type inference #32333
  • Translate Min/Max over inline collection via LEAST/GREATEST #32332
  • Using new[] in select query gives exception .NET 8 #32331
  • Stop projecting last identifier when not needed #32329

Closed

  • Renaming `PeriodStart` and `PeriodEnd` columns of a temporal table causes them to be swapped #29902
    9.0.0
  • Unnecessary `SELECT` wrapper around executed SQL #32327
  • EntityTypeAttributeConventionBase disappearance from EF7 to EF8 #32322
  • Hi there #32306
  • EF Core 7 non-nullable string property with empty string throws `not-null constraint` exception #32304
  • Regression with translation of `Contains` for SqlServer #32291
  • Unexpected Additional Foreign Key Generation in Migration When Using `IEntityTypeConfiguration` #32290
  • PrincipalKey causes duplicate key problem for tracked entity #32161
  • Using dotnet ef 7 tool from with net8 #32155
  • add migrations in EF core 6 or 7 remove annotation on primary key #32324
  • Segmentation fault on Migrate() on s390x #32209
  • Ef Core Query loosing rupee unicode symbol ₹ when trying to do a simple like query on it, instead generating "?" mark #32027

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync (#31449) #32334
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix to #29902 - Renaming PeriodStart and PeriodEnd columns of a temporal table causes them to be swapped #32328
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32217 - Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument (and possibly other non-lambda arguments) #32317
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.1
  • Add primitive collection regression test #32330
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • License scan updates #17833
  • These changes should allow complete cross-builds just via OverrideTargetRid #17832
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17829

Merged
